title: 2024 Global Procurement Trends
summary: Global procurement teams are prioritising dual sourcing strategies for semiconductors, industrial electronics, and renewable energy components to mitigate geopolitical risk.

title: Supplier Risk Signals
summary: Specialty chemical suppliers are extending average lead times by 12-15% because of feedstock shortages. Buyers are negotiating safety stock clauses and quarterly price indexation to protect margins.

title: Sustainable Procurement Benchmarks
summary: Top quartile procurement organisations now require Science Based Targets initiative disclosures in RFQs for logistics, packaging, and facilities partners to validate carbon reduction commitments.
